name: skull-fossil
effect: Give to a scientist in the mining museum in oreburgh city or the Museum of Science in pewter city to receive a cranidos.
short_effect: Can be revived into a Cranidos.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that lived on the land. It appears to be part of a head.
flavor_text.platinum: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that lived on the land. It appears to be part of a head.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that lived on the land. It appears to be part of a head.
